CDB2FAE9-2230-4B4B-ABA2-673267CA0166.text: This action runs a Python script that can be configured with your own parameters. Tap the options (▼) button to edit the script or the parameters that are shown here. This comment is actually a text parameter itself – feel free to remove it.

parameters.__custom_action_script__:
import workflow
import webbrowser
from urllib import quote

params = workflow.get_parameters()

account = params.get('Account', None)
tweet = params.get('Tweet', None)
callback = params.get('Return to Editorial', False)

#tweetbot://<screenname>/post?text=<text>&callback_url=<url>&in_reply_to_status_id=<tweet_id>

if tweet:
	url = 'tweetbot://'
	if account:
		url += quote(account)
	url += '/post?text=' + quote(tweet)
	if callback:
		url += '&callback_url=' + quote('editorial://')
	webbrowser.open(url)
